entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Guid Marshalling Support #87894
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_72133/Runtime_72133/Runtime_72133.dll #87888
    8.0.0
  • iOSNativeAOT app build failing #87886
  • The environment variable "DOTNET_TC_CallCountThreshold" should be configurable via runtimeconfig #87885
  • Generate UUID-5 in FIPS-140-3 mode using SHA-1\MD-5 (RFC-4122) #87884
  • Add test to confirm the general purpose bit flag is unset when no encoding is specified in ZipArchive #87882
    8.0.0
  • `UnsafeAccessor` works on non-static methods #87881
  • `JIT/jit64/opt/rngchk/RngchkStress2.cs` failing to build with `error CS8078: An expression is too long or complex to compile` #87879
  • [wasm] Blazor project failing to publish on windows due to a unicode character in the path #87877
    8.0.0
  • (Blazor.WASM) Cannot use Debug when using generic attribute #87871
  • ILStrip failure for FsToolkit.ErrorHandling(Must be of type CilStrip.Mono.Cecil.TypeReference) #87867
  • [TestFailure] GetAsync_SetAutomaticDecompression_ContentDecompressed_Deflate (Gateway Timeout) #87864
  • .NET Version: 6.0.0 Fatal Error The process was terminated due to an internal error in the .NET Runtime * with exit code 80131506(ExecutionEngineException?) #87858
  • [Wasm] Profiled AOT fails on System.IO invocations #87856
  • AVX-512 debugger support: view registers #87854
    Future

Closed

  • Publish NativeAOT compiler with NativeAOT #67742
    8.0.0
  • gcc fails to arch-cross-compile on GNU/Linux in NativeAOT .NET 7 #78559
    8.0.0
  • .Net NativeAOT doesn't generate System.Net.Security.Native lib #87701
  • `PublishTrimmed` causing `dotnet publish` to hang #86379
  • Problem with interception StandardOutput in Linux #73923
    Future
  • Issue with zip headers general purpose flags bit 11 for OPC packages. #87658
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: InstrumentRecorder - notification of new measurements #86783
    Future
  • Reduce duplication between InstrumentRecorder and MeterCollector #87243
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: More granular control over properties during (de)serialization with System.Text.Json #87875
  • [API Proposal]: Expose options to only generate one direction for generated COM interfaces #86360
    8.0.0
  • ILLink+NativeAOT testing integration #70395
    8.0.0
  • .NET 7 PublishReadyToRun causes crash when publishing, but it worked on .NET 6 #78278
    7.0.x
  • why i add dotnet to path but application with --no-self-contained cannot run #87819
  • System.Text.Json source generator fails for covariant properties when [JsonIgnore] is specified #63443
    Future
  • System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.SourceGenerator failed to generate with custom array attribute value on property #81124
    8.0.0
  • System.AccessViolationException occurring in managed code on dotnet 7 #83242
    8.0.0
  • Crash when `GetHashCode` is called under specific circumstances #87551
  • System.Configuration.TypeUtil.GetImplicitType #84244
    Future
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientHandlerTest_Http3.ServerSendsTrailingHeaders_Success #87814
  • [API Proposal]: HttpRequestOptions should implement IReadOnlyDictionary #68149
    Future
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization implement collation native functions #86699
  • Blazor ValidationMessage does not respect the display annotation #86595
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessTests.TotalProcessorTime_PerformLoop_TotalProcessorTimeValid #86739
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [IGNORE][wasm] CI for running wbt with multithreaded runtime #87895
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • Bump main to Preview 7 #87893
    area-Infrastructure
  • Auto generate Event Ids in the logging source gen #87892
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2206720 #87891
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fire AssemblyUnloadStarted event #87890
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [nativeaot][perf] Remove unused _LinkerFlagsToDrop property from the sample app #87889
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Move NTAuthentication/NegotiateStreamPal back to the mothership #87887
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [hot_reload] Give more info about why the runtime can't apply updates #87880
    area-EnC-mono
  • Optimizes vector conversions with AVX512 #87878
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Faster optimized frozen dictionary creation (4/n) #87876
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • avoid allocations for TLS handshake #87874
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Ensure Min/Max APIs are handled for float in VN #87872
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Insert writebacks more eagerly #87869
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support filtering property names on dictionary deserialization #87868
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add support for `--instruction-set:native` #87865
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Test-only PR for custom perfmap and diagnostic ipc locations #87859
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add missing compiler-generated attributes to corelib #87857
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Disable promotion for splitted args #87855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

Merged

  • Remove InstrumentRecorder class #87873
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • Update WCF package versions #87787
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][debugger] Concurrency on execution context dictionary #87870
    area-Debugger-mono
  • System.IO.Packaging: Avoid setting the general purpose bitflag due to enforced UTF8 encoding on ZipArchive creation #87883
    area-System.IO.Compression, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Misc build+test fixes #87830
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Implement unidirectional GeneratedComInterface options #87831
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix typos in Process.cs #87683
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Don't create type loader for apps that don't need it #87678
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update HP libunwind to v1.7.0 #87426
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Include liblog in linker command line for Bionic #87862
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Convert HttpListener to use public NegotiateAuthentication API #86956
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Fix support for JsonSerializerContext contained in arbitrary types. #87829
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Stop allocating address exposed locals if they are unreferenced #87790
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix how jitrollingbuild disable Component Governance #87853
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix ID regression in Alpine Linux builds #86804
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add support for net8.0-browser TFM to WASM sdk #87866
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono][jit] Enabling some Vector4 methods as Intrinsics on arm64. #87684
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] PackedSimd, implement store methods #87828
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][jit] Avoid doing copy propagation on ldaddr for gsharedvt vari… #87713
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][jit] Added Vector128 intrinsics that depend on Vector64 for arm64 #87765
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix PlatformDetection.IsThreadingSupported #87863
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • SPMI: HTML escape lines inside diffs #87861
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix expected analyzer layout in nuget packages #87860
    area-Meta
  • Added IReadOnlyDictionary to HttpRequestOptions #86983
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Implement collation native functions functions #86895
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, os-tvos
  • fixing an assert in GetGCMemoryInfo #87848
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Import isinst/castclass Nullable as underlying type #87241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Apply iteration work limits to X509 certificate loading #87514
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [release/8.0-preview6] Bump package version for .net 7 to 7.0.8 #87896
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use proper context in initClass for GDV #87847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Logging middleware #87550
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Inline TLS field access for linux/osx x64/arm64 #87082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add opt-in support for GeneratedComInterface/ComImport RCW interop #87583
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add support for including System.Index and System.Range downlevel within dotnet/runtime #87840
    area-Meta
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Upgrade to LLVM 16 #87190
    blocked, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Adjust determinism tests to store away the 2 different binaries that are generated #87852
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • GetProcessInfo3 diagnostic command #87707
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • add AllowTlsResume to SslStream options #86047
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Refactor how diagnostics work in the interop generators #87700
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Block "Convert To LibraryImport" in more unsupported cases #87503
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • QUIC ALPN list narrowing down scenario test #86659
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Setup support for managed runtime events #87785
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add IStartupHostedService #87335
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [wasm][debugger] Improve debugger performance based on JMC #86982
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Up Minimum CMake Version to 3.20 #86530
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Crossgen2 support for static virtual method resolution (take 2) #87438
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix constant preparing for shuffle stub #87708
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • TarEntry: remove some unneeded checks when extracting symbolic and hard links. #85378
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [WIP] enable regions for MacOS #87421
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Avoid reporting frozen segments in GetGenerationBounds #85727
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve memory utilization in the case of continuous BGC #87715
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Fix float to int/uint casting behavior #86941
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Try adding cross-compilers for Musl #87841
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Expand interpreter PackedSimd support #87719
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Accelerating Vector512.Sum() #87851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Upgrading SpanHelpers with Vector512 #86655
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [mono] Do not ignore non-public custom attributes in dynamic assemblies #87406
    area-VM-reflection-mono
  • Fix invalid datetimeoffset parsing #87801
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Optimize GetType with known type #87579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Induce more physical promotions #87810
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [ios][tests] Run the Mono and Native AOT iOS samples as functional tests on Helix #87773
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] dotnet.exe prints error messages to console when launched with empty DOTNET_MULTILEVEL_LOOKUP #87734
    area-Host, 7.0.x
  • [browser][MT] Make HTTP and WS clients work #87567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add vectorization for Vector4 #87822
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix budgets for dynamic heap count and add smoothing to overhead computation #87618
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve dynamic heap count #87619
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Implement Stopwatch.ToString() #87812
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Upgrade all VMs to AMD64 Ubuntu 22.04 #86194
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add custom hosts file support to Dns #87832
    area-System.Net
  • [DO NOT MERGE][mono] try to interrupt Monitor.Wait #87836
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Email addresses in same domain not equal #87721
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
